duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct nursing care as well as unit leadership
Operational responsibility for the unit/department and for the quality of care delivered 24/7
Demonstrate respect, dignity, kindness, and empathy with all patients, families, visitors, and employees
Ability to direct self & others, aware of nursing standards, evidence-based practice, policies and procedures
Demonstrate clinical proficiency relevant to the area of responsibility, rapid decision making and critical thinking skills

education_certification.credential: Licensed to practice nursing in the State where work is performed
